Breeding male.description: Buffleheads are smaller than Hooded Mergansers. Males have a white belly and sides whereas male Hooded Mergansers have cinnamon sides.

Female.description: Buffleheads are smaller than Hooded Mergansers. Female Buffleheads have a white spot on the face that females and nonbreeding male Hooded Mergansers Lack.

Breeding male.description: Male Red-breasted Mergansers lack the white head patch seen on Hooded Mergansers and have a longer, thinner red bill than Hooded Merganser.

Female/nonbreeding male.description: Females and nonbreeding male Red-breasted Mergansers have a longer, thinner red bill and a longer neck than Hooded Mergansers.

Breeding male and female.description: Common Mergansers are larger than Hooded Mergansers with a longer, thinner bill and paler sides.
